name: @codefreak/breeze
description: Pluggable cloud-native editor and REPL environment for the browser
author: Henning Kasch <henning.kasch@gmail.com>

scripts.start: yarn workspace @codefreak/breeze-app generate && yarn run tsc && yarn workspace @codefreak/breeze-app start
scripts.build: yarn run tsc && yarn workspace @codefreak/breeze-app build
